mav_sim.chap3.data_viewer module¶

data_viewer

part of mavsimPy

  • Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Update history:

    12/17/2018 - RWB 1/14/2019 - RWB 2/27/2020 - RWB 12/21 - GND

class mav_sim.chap3.data_viewer.DataViewer¶

Bases: object

Plotting capabilities for viewing states, inputs, noise, etc

reset(start_time: float) → None¶

reset all data to begin plotting again starting at time = start_time

update(true_state: MsgState, estimated_state: MsgState, commanded_state: MsgState, delta: MsgDelta, ts: float) → None¶

Update each of the plots

Parameters:

  • true_state – The actual state

  • estimated_state – The current estimate of the state

  • commanded_state – The state being commanded

  • delta – Vehicle control commands

  • ts – Time step
